Quote: An eye for an eye makes the whole world blind.
Author: Gandhi

Quote: Love For All, Hatred For None.
Author: Khalifatul Masih III

Quote: Change the world by being yourself.
Author: Amy Poehler

Quote: Every moment is a fresh beginning.
Author: T.S Eliot

Quote: Never regret anything that made you smile.
Author: Mark Twain

Quote: Die with memories, not dreams.
Author: Unknown

Quote: Aspire to inspire before we expire.
Author: Unknown

Quote: Everything you can imagine is real.
Author: Pablo Picasso

Quote: Simplicity is the ultimate sophistication.
Author: Leonardo da Vinci

Quote: Whatever you do, do it well.
Author: Walt Disney

Quote: What we think, we become.
Author: Buddha

Quote: All limitations are self-imposed.
Author: Oliver Wendell Holmes

Quote: Tough times never last but tough people do.
Author: Robert H. Schiuller

Quote: Problems are not stop signs, they are guidelines.
Author: Robert H. Schiuller

Quote: One day the people that don’t even believe in you will tell everyone how they met you.
Author: Johnny Depp

Quote: If I’m gonna tell a real story, I’m gonna start with my name.
Author: Kendrick Lamar

Quote: If you tell the truth you don’t have to remember anything.
Author: Mark Twain

Quote: Have enough courage to start and enough heart to finish.
Author: Jessica N. S. Yourko

Quote: Hate comes from intimidation, love comes from appreciation.
Author: Tyga

Quote: I could agree with you but then we’d both be wrong.
Author: Harvey Specter

Quote: Oh, the things you can find, if you don’t stay behind.
Author: Dr. Seuss

Quote: Determine your priorities and focus on them.
Author: Eileen McDargh

Quote: Be so good they can’t ignore you.
Author: Steve Martin

Quote: Dream as if you’ll live forever, live as if you’ll die today.
Author: James Dean

Quote: Yesterday you said tomorrow. Just do it.
Author: Nike

Quote: I don’t need it to be easy, I need it to be worth it.
Author: Lil Wayne

Quote: Never let your emotions overpower your intelligence.
Author: Drake

Quote: Nothing lasts forever but at least we got these memories.
Author: J. Cole

Quote: Don’t you know your imperfections is a blessing?
Author: Kendrick Lamar

Quote: Reality is wrong, dreams are for real.
Author: Tupac

Quote: To live will be an awfully big adventure.
Author: Peter Pan

Quote: Try to be a rainbow in someone’s cloud.
Author: Maya Angelou

Quote: There is no substitute for hard work.
Author: Thomas Edison

Quote: What consumes your mind controls your life
Author: Unknown

Quote: Strive for greatness.
Author: Lebron James

Quote: Wanting to be someone else is a waste of who you are.
Author: Kurt Cobain

Quote: And still, I rise.
Author: Maya Angelou

Quote: The time is always right to do what is right.
Author: Martin Luther King Jr.

Quote: Let the beauty of what you love be what you do.
Author: Rumi

Quote: May your choices reflect your hopes, not your fears.
Author: Nelson Mandela

Quote: A happy soul is the best shield for a cruel world.
Author: Atticus

Quote: White is not always light and black is not always dark.
Author: Habeeb Akande

Quote: Life becomes easier when you learn to accept the apology you never got.
Author: R. Brault

Quote: Happiness depends upon ourselves.
Author: Aristotle

Quote: Turn your wounds into wisdom.
Author: Oprah Winfrey

Quote: Change the game, don’t let the game change you.
Author: Macklemore

Quote: It hurt because it mattered.
Author: John Green

Quote: If the world was blind how many people would you impress?
Author: Boonaa Mohammed

Quote: I will remember and recover, not forgive and forget.
Author: Unknown

Quote: The meaning of life is to give life meaning.
Author: Ken Hudgins

Quote: The true meaning of life is to plant trees, under whose shade you do not expect to sit.
Author: Nelson Henderson

Quote: When words fail, music speaks.
Author: Shakespeare

Quote: Embrace the glorious mess that you are.
Author: Elizabeth Gilbert

Quote: Normality is a paved road: it’s comfortable to walk but no flowers grow.
Author: Vincent van Gogh

Quote: I have nothing to lose but something to gain.
Author: Eminem
